title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
**Unleash the Power of Professional Grade Tools with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit!**

Introducing the DEWALT DCK240C2 Combo Kit – your ultimate solution for efficient and robust power tools that are designed to tackle the toughest jobs with ease. This high-performance kit includes the DCD771 Drill/Driver and the DCF885 Impact Driver, making it the perfect addition to any professional or DIY enthusiast's tool collection.

**Why Choose the DEWALT DCK240C2 Combo Kit?**

- **Versatile Speed & Power**: The DCD771 Drill/Driver features a two-speed transmission offering speeds of 0-450 and 0-1500 RPM, combined with a powerful 300 UWO motor, ensuring you have the right amount of power and speed for a variety of tasks.

- **Compact Design**: Both tools boast a compact and lightweight design, with the Drill/Driver featuring an ergonomic handle for comfort and control, and the Impact Driver measuring just 5.55 inches front to back, making it ideal for working in tight spaces.

- **Ratcheting Chucks**: The 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck on the Drill/Driver and the 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck on the Impact Driver allow for easy bit changes, ensuring you can switch tasks with minimal downtime.

- **Enhanced Visibility**: Each tool comes equipped with an integrated LED light system. The Drill/Driver's LED foot light and the Impact Driver's 3-LED light ring with a 20-second delay provide superior visibility without shadows, so you can work with precision in low light conditions.

- **Reliable Battery Power**: The kit includes two 20V MAX Lithium Ion batteries, ensuring that you always have a backup ready to go. The included charger will keep your batteries powered up and ready for action.

- **Robust Construction**: Finished in DEWALT's signature Yellow/Black colors, these tools are not only stylish but built tough to handle the rigors of the job site.

- **Wide Range of Applications**: Whether you're a professional contractor or a home improvement enthusiast, this combo kit is designed for a wide range of applications, ensuring you're prepared for any project.

**What's Included in the Package?**

- 1x DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- 2x 20V MAX Lithium Ion Batteries
- 1x Battery Charger

Elevate your tool game with the DEWALT DCK240C2 Combo Kit – where robust performance meets precision and durability. Don't compromise on power or convenience; grab this indispensable combo kit today and power through your projects with confidence!

**Unleash the Power of Professional Grade Tools with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit!**

Elevate your toolkit with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (DCK240C2), an indispensable duo designed for efficiency, power, and versatility. Whether you're a seasoned contractor or a dedicated DIY enthusiast, this high-performance package will help you tackle the toughest tasks with ease and precision.

**High-Efficiency Performance**

The kit features two robust power tools: the DCD771 Drill/Driver and the DCF885 Impact Driver. The Drill/Driver boasts a two-speed transmission with ranges of 0-450 and 0-1500 RPM, delivering a potent 300 UWO of power output. The compact and lightweight design, combined with an ergonomic handle, ensures comfort and control, while the 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck offers a reliable grip on your drill bits.

**Compact and Mighty**

The Impact Driver is a true workhorse at just 5.55 inches in length and a feather-light 2.8 lbs. Its one-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips, making bit changes swift and effortless. Illuminate your work area with its three LED light ring with a 20-second delay, providing superior visibility without shadows.

**Ready for Any Challenge**

Both tools are housed in a striking Yellow/Black casing, and the kit includes two 20V MAX Lithium-Ion batteries, ensuring long-lasting power and quick charging with the included charger. The LED foot light feature on both tools enhances visibility in low-light conditions, allowing you to work with confidence and precision.

**Everything You Need in One Package**

The DEWALT 20V MAX Combo Kit is thoughtfully put together to cover a wide range of applications. The package includes:

- 1x DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- 2x 20V MAX Lithium-Ion Batteries
- 1x Battery Charger

**Your Reliable Companion for Every Project**

With the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit, you're not just buying tools; you're investing in a legacy of durability, reliability, and precision that DEWALT has been known for over the years. Don't settle for less—choose DEWALT and power through your projects like a pro!

**Unleash the Power of Cordless Convenience with the DEWALT 20V MAX Combo Kit!**

Are you ready to take on any project with ease and confidence? Look no further than the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This powerhouse duo is designed to tackle a wide range of applications, ensuring you're always prepared for any job.

**High-Performance Tools for High-Quality Results:**

- **Drill/Driver (DCD771):** Experience versatility at its best with a high-speed transmission featuring 2 settings (0-450 & 0-1500 RPM) for a range of fastening and drilling applications. Feel the might of its robust 300 UWO motor in a compact and lightweight design that's engineered for comfort and control thanks to its ergonomic handle.

- **Impact Driver (DCF885):** Make light work of tough tasks with this impact driver's 5.55-inch front-to-back design and feather-light 2.8 lbs heft. The one-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips, making bit changes a breeze. Plus, the built-in LED light ring with 3 LEDs ensures your work area is shadow-free.

**Power That Lasts:**

With two 20V Lithium-Ion batteries included, you'll enjoy longer run-time and consistent power. The kit also comes with a charger, so you're never down for long. The batteries are quick to recharge, getting you back to work faster.

**Enhanced Visibility for Precision Work:**

Both tools feature integrated LED lights. The drill boasts a superior LED foot light, while the impact driver has a 3-LED light ring with a 20-second delay after trigger release, illuminating your workspace without casting shadows.

**Bold and Reliable:**

Sporting the iconic DEWALT Yellow/Black color scheme, this combo kit not only looks professional but is built to last. The durable and reliable construction is what you expect from a brand that professionals trust.

**Everything You Need in One Kit:**

The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (DCK240C2) includes:
- 1x DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- 2x 20V MAX Lithium-Ion Batteries
- 1x Battery Charger

Whether you're a seasoned contractor or a DIY enthusiast, the DEWALT 20V MAX Combo Kit is your go-to solution for power, performance, and portability. Don't let cords hold you back. Embrace the freedom of cordless with DEWALT and make every project a success. Get yours today and power through your to-do list with ease!
